data.name: XProgressHandler
desc: Handle a tasks notification that it has made some progress.

methods.name: pop
desc: The task notifies the handler that it has finished its current activity.

methods.name: push
desc: The task notifies the handler that it has started some new activity (possibly a sub-activity of another activity already making progress; therefore, these notifications behave in a stack-like manner).

methods.name: update
desc: The task notifies the handler that its current activity is making progress.
